WorkItem.Description:
Hi,
 
When binding the IntervalType property of the DateTimesAxis to a ViewModel class, it crashed .Net when trying o refresh the preview area. 
 
If I escape the refresh of the preview and launch the debugger, the Window never opens.
 
Here a code sample of the xaml (DataContext is set to the ViewModel class before the window.show in the app startup :
 
        <WPFToolkitCharting:Chart Grid.Row="1">
            <WPFToolkitCharting:Chart.Axes>
                <WPFToolkitCharting:LinearAxis Orientation="Y"/>
                <WPFToolkitCharting:DateTimeAxis Orientation="X"  
                   ShowGridLines="True" 
                   IntervalType="{Binding DataSetChartVM.IntervalType}" Interval="1" />
            </WPFToolkitCharting:Chart.Axes>
            <WPFToolkitCharting:Chart.Series>
                <WPFToolkitCharting:LineSeries Title="{Binding Name}" IndependentValueBinding="{Binding Date}" 
                                                 DependentValueBinding="{Binding  Value}" ItemsSource="{Binding Items}"/>
            </WPFToolkitCharting:Chart.Series>
        </WPFToolkitCharting:Chart>
 
I did not get the chance yet to run this with the Tollkit source to this what happens.
 
Any thought ?
 
Cheers
